name: Lisa in the Sky with Diamonds
name_original: Lisa in the Sky with Diamonds
description:
Lisa a penguin using diamonds falling for the sky to fly. It is an jumping game that never ends and challenges you to get the highest score.

Controls:

  • Mobile: Touch the sides to move Lisa.
  • Browser: Use the mouse to click on buttons and click on the screen to make Lisa start flying. Use arrow keys to move Lisa.  

This game is based on Winter Bells, was made for learning purpose using Construct 2.
